posts.postText:
Steam ID STEAM_0:1:927232

Randomly shooting, shooting explosive barrels, RDM

TTT

Chopper

I should be unbanned because, i was not the one who commited these actions to the best of mine and Udanes knowledge, the person who DID shoot the explosive barrles and RDM was Carrotbran (That was his current steam nickname). The random shooting was a false accusation as i was traitor and i was killing people to win the game.
I hope in youre busy times you can get to this thank you, and have a nice day

That is a lie. If Carrotbran had been the person to shoot the barrel it would have clearly showed up in damage logs as him doing the damage, but no, it came up as you. And I would have been fine if you would have warned us like Drfitwood did, but you hadn't. And regardless that wasn't the only reason of your ban, you also attempted to RDM me with some weird ass reasoning that I don't remember. And to top that off, you killed a proven innocent. Here are all those logs:
 http://i162.photobucket.com/albums/t245/kennyd3333/motochad1.jpg 
 http://i162.photobucket.com/albums/t245/kennyd3333/motochad2.jpg 
 http://i162.photobucket.com/albums/t245/kennyd3333/motochad3.jpg 

Edit: But with that in mind, I know you were no troll and purposely doing all this. A week imo might be to long, but that is all up to the staff of the forum.
